io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions.WebSocketExtensionData

  • Packages that use WebSocketExtensionData 
    Package Description
    io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions
    Encoder, decoder, handshakers to handle WebSocket Extensions.
    io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions.compression
    Encoder, decoder, handshakers to handle most common WebSocket Compression Extensions.

    • Uses of WebSocketExtensionData in io.netty5.handler.codec.http.websocketx.extensions

      WebSocketExtensionData WebSocketClientExtensionHandshaker.newRequestData()
      Return extension configuration to submit to the server.
      WebSocketExtensionData WebSocketServerExtension.newResponseData()
      Return an extension configuration to submit to the client as an acknowledge.
